snippet: Gov. Chris Christie, Republican of New Jersey, sat down with John Harwood of The Times and CNBC to discuss his party, his state’s pension shortfall, the bridge-closure controversy and his presidential prospects.
abstract: Gov. Chris Christie, Republican of New Jersey, sat down with John Harwood of The Times and CNBC to discuss his party, his state’s pension shortfall, the bridge-closure controversy and his presidential prospects.

headline.main: 10 Questions for Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey
